[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” custom_css_main_element=”max-width:850px;”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”0px||40px|” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″]

Market Leader is the Growth Engine Behind My Business

Aubie Pouncey of Keller Williams Realty, relies on Market Leader to completely manage his full database (past and present clients) in one location. He appreciates the easy-to-use tools that allow him and his team to engage, nurture, and follow up with leads and clients. Aubie leverages customization options on the front end website of Market Leader Pro to control and optimize his brand presence. Business intelligence tools allow Aubie and his team to tailor the right message to the right person at the right time.

“Market Leader is the growth engine behind my entire business,” Aubie states, allowing him to achieve year-over-year growth for the past 5 years.

Aubie relies on Market Leader Leads Direct and HouseValues leads to generate a steady, predictable flow of leads each month. He never has to wonder where his next client is coming from. From leads to a robust CRM, marketing center, and website, Aubie states, “Market Leader is the absolute most feature-rich product that’s available on the market.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#f4f4f4″ custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ max_width=”900px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”40px|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center”]

Explore the products that are helping Aubie grow his business:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”ML Professional” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Everything you need to generate leads and convert them into lifelong clients: Customizable Website, CRM, and Marketing Design Center.

Learn More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Customizable Websites” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”]

Customizable Websites

Showcase your business with a fully customized website – without the cost of a web developer!

Learn More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” type=”1_3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” admin_label=”Real Estate Leads” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]
